description:
A tiny voice commanded spline-twin-stick shooter, without a shoot button.

For the best experience play with a game-pad! Over the course of two days my brother and I created this little game for the GMTK Game Jam. 

Requirements:

  1. Windows
  2. A Microphone

Inquiries: rotospacestudios@gmail.com

Programmer: Mario (Tibba) Sinn

Artist: Richard (Lil Roto) Sinn

License Information is enclosed within the archive.

Controls:

There is game-pad support.

AD and the left Thumb-stick steer your ship.  Tab/Escape opens the main menu.
